summary: Adds several spells and spell tomes to the game, As well as an enchantment effect.
descriptionHtml:
Changes version 1.2 - 
Removed requirements for Dragonborn DLC. Now requires only vanilla skyrim.
Added Enchantment:
Waterwalking, Alteration, Blue Enchant shader

Notes: It seems the Waterwalking effect still allows you to be submerged up to your ankles. I think this is a Bethesda thing and am not sure if it can be corrected. Also the enchantment may be slightly unbalancing as i don\'t know how to make it require a large soul.

Currently obtainable
Changes version 1.1 - 
Adds Spells:
Lesser Waterbreathing, Apprentice Alteration, Waterbreathing for 30 seconds. 103 Magicka
Waterwalking, Adept Alteration, Waterwalking for 60 seconds. 222 Magicka
Lesser Waterwalking, Apprentice Alteration, Waterwalking for 30 seconds. 103 Magicka
Least Waterwalking, Novice Alteration, Waterwalking while concentrating 20 Magicka

They are currently buyable from Falion in Morthal, or are available as a modder\'s resource. 

Notes:
There is a 60 second Waterbreathing spell already active in-game, and I didn\'t create a concentration version because you could use it to indefinitely stay under water in some situations. The Waterwalking spell was adapted from that Waterbreathing spell. There are spell tomes for each spell added.

This Mod now ONLY requires Skyrim
Use only one of the files. They will conflict.
author: ParadoxLiving
